thread.title: BRIEF-Micron Solutions Announces Multi-Year Exclusive Manufacturing Agreement With Its Largest Customer

title: BRIEF-Micron Solutions Announces Multi-Year Exclusive Manufacturing Agreement With Its Largest Customer
text: February 27, 2018 / 5:29 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Micron Solutions Announces Multi-Year Exclusive Manufacturing Agreement With Its Largest Customer Reuters Staff Feb 27 (Reuters) - Micron Solutions Inc: * MICRON SOLUTIONS, INC. ANNOUNCES MULTI-YEAR EXCLUSIVE MANUFACTURING AGREEMENT WITH ITS LARGEST CUSTOMER * MICRON SOLUTIONS INC - UNDER CONTRACT, HAS RECEIVED PURCHASE ORDERS FOR $3.4 MILLION FOR FIRST YEAR OF PRODUCTION * MICRON SOLUTIONS INC - EXPECTS PRODUCTION UNDER AGREEMENT TO COMMENCE IN Q1 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
